properties.entry: SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#checkIdDuplicate() */ A.USER_ID FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.USER_ID = ?

INSERT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#insertMember() */ INTO TBL_USER A ( A.USER_NO , A.USER_ID , A.USER_PWD , A.NICKNAME , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.USER_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , 'Y' )
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectEncryptedPwd() */ A.USER_PWD FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.USER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.USER_ID = ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectLoginMember() */ A.USER_NO , A.USER_ID , A.NICKNAME , PHONE , EMAIL , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.USER_ROLE , A.USER_STATUS FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.USER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.USER_ID = ?
